mapper.select: SELECT product.product_id, product.cover_img, brand.english_name, tag_product_rel.sort_num FROM tag_product_rel INNER JOIN product ON tag_product_rel.product_id = product.product_id AND product.enabled = TRUE INNER JOIN brand ON brand.brand_id = product.brand_id AND brand.enabled = TRUE WHERE tag_product_rel.tag_id = #{tagId};
SELECT tag.tag_id, block_tag_rel.block_tag_id, block_tag_rel.block_id FROM tag LEFT JOIN block_tag_rel ON tag.tag_id = block_tag_rel.tag_id WHERE tag.tag_id = #{tagId} AND tag.enabled = TRUE;
SELECT tag.tag_id, tag.tag_name FROM tag LEFT JOIN block_tag_rel ON tag.tag_id = block_tag_rel.tag_id WHERE tag.enabled = TRUE AND block_tag_rel.block_tag_id IS NULL;
